page.title: 05North of Llanfihangel
page.content: The farmers main interest is his farm, keeping his land in good heart, his hedges & fences repaired & tidy and his machinery well maintained. However, he does take time off for leisure activities which include sport, horse riding, entering animals at agricultural shows or just visiting the mart or the pub for a chat with his neighbours. The wives main interests are cooking & gardening but can also include antiques, craft work, Womens Institute, riding & entering horticultural shows. Husband & wife may enjoy going to the local & national agricultural shows (as either spectator or competitor), watching TV, attending church/chapel, joining in local clubs & activities, or having a day out, usually shopping in the nearest city or large town.
